about.title: 1. About UrbanDrop
content: UrbanDrop is an online marketplace that connects customers with independent merchants offering groceries, meals, and ethnic products for delivery or collection. We provide the digital infrastructure, payment processing, and customer interface, but we do not produce, own, or sell the items listed on the Platform.
When you place an order through UrbanDrop, you are purchasing directly from the merchant, not from UrbanDrop.

hero.desc: We are more than just a marketplace. We are a digital bridge connecting you to the flavors, traditions, and people that make your community unique.

purpose.quote: To simplify daily movement and bring convenience closer to people.

hero.desc: Join hundreds of trusted merchants selling fresh and quality foods through our app.

reach.title: Expand your reach
reach.subtitle: Connect with thousands of customers across different regions.

sales.title: Increase your sales
sales.subtitle: Boost your revenue with our large user base.

management.title: Easy management
management.subtitle: Manage your store effortlessly with our intuitive tools.

community.title: Community support
community.subtitle: Join a successful community of merchants and receive support.

list.title: List your products
list.desc: Easily upload and showcase your unique products to a large audience.

receive.title: Receive orders
receive.desc: Get instant notifications for new orders and manage them efficiently.

earn.title: Earn & Grow
earn.desc: Process payments securely and watch your earnings grow with every sale.

analyze.title: Analyze performance
analyze.desc: Access comprehensive analytics to understand your sales and customer behavior.

cta.title: Start growing with Urbandrop today!
cta.desc: It takes less than 10 minutes to sign up and start selling. Join hundreds of successful merchants already growing their business.
cta.footer: Questions? Our team is ready to help you every step of the way.

listingProducts.headline: List Your Products
listingProducts.description: Showcase your inventory to thousands of local customers looking for authentic ethnic groceries.

appBanner.description: Get high visibility with premium banner placements right on the app home screen.

inAppPromotions.headline: In-App Promotions
inAppPromotions.description: Run targeted promotions and special offers to drive sales and attract new customers.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
content: UrbanDrop Group Limited is a company registered in England and Wales under company number 16026087.
We operate an online marketplace connecting customers with merchants who sell groceries, prepared foods, and ethnic products for delivery or collection.

infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoCollect.intro: We collect personal information that helps us deliver, improve, and manage our services. This may include:

direct.title: Information You Provide Directly
items: Name, contact number, and delivery address.
Email address and account password.
Payment and billing information (processed securely by our payment partners).
Feedback, messages, or reviews you submit.
Merchant registration details (for business users), including company name, trading address, and bank account details.

automatic.title: Information Collected Automatically
automatic.intro: When you use UrbanDrop, we may automatically collect:
items: Device and browser information (IP address, operating system, device type).
Location data (if you allow location services).
Usage data such as pages visited, app interactions, and order activity.
Log files and diagnostic data to improve performance and security.

thirdParty.title: Information from Third Parties
items: Payment providers (e.g., to confirm transaction status).
Identity verification services.
Delivery partners (e.g., order delivery status).
Analytics and advertising partners that help us understand usage trends.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
items: Process and deliver your orders.
Communicate with you about your account, orders, and customer support requests.
Verify your identity and prevent fraud.
Manage payments, refunds, and credits.
Provide merchants with order details necessary for fulfilment.
Personalize your experience and recommend relevant products.
Improve platform functionality, performance, and content.
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations.

legalBasis.intro: We will only use your data where we have a lawful basis to do so under data protection laws, such as:
items: To perform our contract with you (e.g., fulfil an order).
To comply with legal obligations.
For legitimate business interests (e.g., improving user experience).
With your consent (e.g., marketing).

marketing.title: Marketing Communications
content: We may send you marketing emails or notifications about new products, offers, or promotions if you have given us permission.
You can opt out at any time by:
items: Clicking "unsubscribe" in any marketing email, or
Adjusting your preferences in the UrbanDrop app or contacting us directly.
marketing.note: Even if you opt out, we may still send non-promotional messages (e.g., order confirmations or account notices).

sharing.title: Sharing Your Information
sharing.intro: We may share limited personal data with:
items: Merchants: to prepare, fulfil, and deliver your order.
Delivery Partners: to deliver your order accurately and safely.
Payment Processors: to process payments securely.
IT and Cloud Providers: who help us operate our systems.
Analytics and Advertising Partners: to improve services and marketing effectiveness.
Regulators or Law Enforcement: where required by law or to protect our rights.
sharing.note: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.intro: We keep your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfil the purposes for which it was collected, including legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
items: Customer order records: retained for up to 6 years under UK tax and consumer laws.
Merchant data: retained for as long as the account remains active and for 6 years thereafter.
Support messages and feedback: retained for operational and legal reference.
retention.note: When data is no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize it.

security.title: Data Security
content: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or loss.
items: Encrypted data transmission (SSL/TLS).
Secure payment gateways (PCI DSS compliant).
Access controls and authentication systems.
Regular security monitoring and audits.
security.note: However, no online service is entirely risk-free. You are responsible for safeguarding your account credentials.

international.title: International Transfers
international.intro: Some of our service providers or partners may process your data outside the UK or European Economic Area (EEA). Where this occurs, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as:
items: Adequacy decisions approved by the UK or EU.
Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs).
Binding corporate rules or equivalent protection mechanisms.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: Under the UK GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
items: Access â€“ to request a copy of your data.
Rectification â€“ to correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten") â€“ to request deletion of your data when it's no longer needed.
Restriction â€“ to limit how your data is processed.
Portability â€“ to receive your data in a usable format or have it transferred to another provider.
Objection â€“ to object to processing for legitimate interest or direct marketing.
Withdrawal of Consent â€“ if processing is based on consent.
rights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, contact us at DPO@urbandrop.io. We may ask for verification before fulfilling your request.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
content: UrbanDrop uses cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, remember preferences, and analyze traffic.
You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings, but doing so may affect the Platform's functionality.
For more details, please see our Cookie Policy.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: UrbanDrop is not directed at children under 18, and we do not knowingly collect personal data from minors. If we become aware that we have collected such data, we will delete it promptly.

links.title: Links to Other Sites
links.content: Our Platform may include links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, privacy practices, or security of those external sites.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The latest version will always be available on our website or app. If changes are significant, we will notify users by email or app notification before they take effect.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions, concerns, or data protection requests, contact:
contact.ico: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Information Commissioner's Office (ICO) in the UK.
contact.website: Website: www.ico.org.uk

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.desc: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website or use an app. They help us remember your preferences, improve performance, and personalize your experience. Some cookies are essential for the Platform to work properly, while others help us understand how users interact with our services so we can improve them.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.desc: These cookies are necessary for the Platform to function. They enable core features like secure login, checkout, and account management. Without them, certain services cannot be provided. Examples include keeping you logged in, managing your cart, and processing payments securely.

performance.title: Performance & Analytics Cookies
performance.desc: These cookies help us understand how visitors use UrbanDrop, such as which pages are most popular or where users encounter errors. We use this information to improve navigation, speed, and user experience. Examples include Google Analytics and app performance trackers. All data collected is aggregated and anonymous.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.desc: These cookies remember your preferences like language, location, or delivery address to make your experience easier.

advertising.title: Advertising & Marketing Cookies
advertising.desc: These cookies allow us and selected partners to show you relevant offers and promotions, both on UrbanDrop and on other websites or apps. They also help limit the number of times you see the same ad. Examples include Meta Pixel (Facebook/Instagram Ads) and Google Ads Remarketing. You can opt out of personalized ads via your account settings or browser privacy settings.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.desc: Some cookies on UrbanDrop come from trusted third parties that help us provide certain services, for example analytics providers (e.g., Google Analytics), advertising networks, and payment and delivery partners. These third parties may use cookies in accordance with their own privacy policies. UrbanDrop has no control over their cookie settings.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.desc: You can manage or disable cookies via your browser or device settings. Most browsers let you see what cookies are stored on your device, delete existing cookies, and block some or all cookies. If you disable cookies, some parts of the Platform may not function properly (e.g., checkout or saved addresses). You can also adjust cookie preferences via the UrbanDrop Cookie Settings banner when you first visit our website or via your account settings.

consent.title: Consent
consent.desc: When you first visit UrbanDrop, you will see a banner asking for your consent to use non-essential cookies. By clicking "Accept All", you agree to the use of all cookies as described here. You can update your preferences at any time by clicking "Manage Cookies" in the site footer or via your profile. Essential cookies do not require consent as they are necessary to provide the service you requested.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.desc: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. The latest version will always be available on our website or app. If changes are significant, we will notify users by email or app notification before they take effect.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact:

notFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
notFoundPage.desc: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
notFoundPage.illustration: We couldn't find the page, but we found these fresh ingredients!
notFoundPage.searchSuggestion: Try searching for what you need or visit our Help Center.

banner.title: We value your privacy
banner.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. UrbanDrop uses essential cookies to make our site work, and optional cookies to help us understand how you use it, personalize content, and show you relevant offers. You can choose to accept all cookies, reject non-essential ones, or manage your preferences at any time.

modal.title: Cookie Preferences
modal.description: Manage how we use cookies on this site.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are needed for UrbanDrop to function properly. They enable secure login, checkout, and payment processing. You canâ€™t turn these off through our settings, but you can block them in your browser (which may affect functionality).
essential.examples: Examples: login sessions, shopping basket tracking, payment processing.

performance.title: Performance and Analytics Cookies
performance.description: These help us understand how visitors use UrbanDrop like which pages are most visited or where users experience delays. They allow us to improve speed, reliability, and overall usability.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These remember your preferences, such as language, location, and saved addresses, so you donâ€™t need to re-enter them each time.
functional.examples: Examples: preferred delivery address, saved shop filters.

advertising.title: Advertising and Marketing Cookies
advertising.description: We use these to show you personalized promotions and relevant ads, both on UrbanDrop and on other websites. They help us measure the performance of marketing campaigns and avoid showing the same ads repeatedly.
advertising.examples: Examples: Meta Pixel, Google Ads Remarketing.

footer.text1: You can update your cookie choices anytime by selecting â€œManage Cookiesâ€ in our website footer or app menu.

intro.title: UrbanDrop Website Terms & Conditions
intro.p1: Welcome to UrbanDrop. These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the UrbanDrop website, mobile application, and related services (collectively the "Platform") operated by UrbanDrop Group Limited ("UrbanDrop," "we," "us," or "our").
intro.p2: By accessing or using the Platform, you agree to these Terms. Please read them carefully before using the service. If you do not agree, you must not use the Platform.

about.title: 1. About UrbanDrop
content: UrbanDrop is an online marketplace that connects customers with independent merchants offering groceries, meals, and ethnic products for delivery or collection. We provide the digital infrastructure, payment processing, and customer interface, but we do not produce, own, or sell the items listed on the Platform.
When you place an order through UrbanDrop, you are purchasing directly from the merchant, not from UrbanDrop.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use the Platform. By using it, you confirm that:
items: You have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements.
You will use the Platform only for lawful purposes.
You will provide accurate information when creating an account or placing an order.

creation.title: 3.1 Account Creation
creation.content: To place an order, you may need to create an UrbanDrop account. You must provide accurate details including your name, delivery address, and payment information.

security.title: 3.2 Account Security
security.content: You are responsible for keeping your login credentials secure. Any activity under your account is considered your responsibility.

misuse.title: 3.3 Misuse
misuse.content: UrbanDrop may suspend or close accounts used for fraudulent activities, abuse of promotions, or violations of these Terms.

placing.title: 4.1 Placing an Order
placing.content: When you place an order, you are offering to purchase products from a merchant listed on UrbanDrop. Once the merchant accepts your order, a contract is formed between you and that merchant.

confirmation.title: 4.2 Order Confirmation
confirmation.content: You will receive a confirmation via the Platform once your order is accepted. Merchants may cancel orders if items are unavailable or cannot be fulfilled, in which case no charge will be made.

payments.title: 4.3 Payments
payments.content: All payments are processed securely via UrbanDrop's payment partners. You authorize UrbanDrop to collect payments on behalf of the merchant.

pricing.title: 4.4 Pricing
pricing.content: Prices are set by merchants and include applicable taxes. Delivery, service, and packaging fees may apply and will be displayed before checkout.

areas.title: 5.1 Delivery Areas
areas.content: Delivery is available only in areas where UrbanDrop or its logistics partners operate.

partners.title: 5.2 Delivery Partners
partners.content: Orders may be delivered by UrbanDrop's delivery network or directly by the merchant. Delivery times are estimates and may vary due to traffic, weather, or other factors outside our control.

collection.title: 5.3 Collection Orders
collection.content: If you choose collection, please arrive at the scheduled time. Merchants may refuse to hold items longer than a reasonable period.

platform.title: 6.1 Platform Promotions
platform.content: UrbanDrop may occasionally offer promotions or discounts. Each has its own rules, which apply alongside these Terms.

merchant.title: 6.2 Merchant Promotions
merchant.content: Promotions created by merchants are solely funded by the merchant. UrbanDrop reviews and approves such offers but is not financially responsible for them.

misuse.title: 6.3 Misuse
misuse.content: UrbanDrop reserves the right to suspend or remove offers if abuse or fraudulent activity is detected.

merchant.title: 7. Merchant Responsibilities
merchant.content: Each merchant on UrbanDrop is an independent business. Merchants are solely responsible for:
items: The accuracy of product information, pricing, and images.
Food safety, hygiene, and proper product labelling.
Compliance with local licensing and trading laws.
merchant.note: UrbanDrop does not manufacture, test, or guarantee the products sold by merchants.

conduct.title: 8. Customer Conduct
items: Misuse the Platform or attempt to disrupt its operation.
Harass, abuse, or threaten merchants, drivers, or customer support.
Create multiple accounts to exploit promotions.
Post false reviews or misleading feedback.
conduct.note: UrbanDrop reserves the right to suspend or ban any account violating these standards.

before.title: 9.1 Before Merchant Acceptance
before.content: You can cancel an order free of charge at any time before it is accepted by the merchant.

after.title: 9.2 After Merchant Acceptance
after.content: Once a merchant has accepted your order, cancellation may not be possible, especially for perishable or prepared items. If the merchant has already started preparing your order, you will be charged the full amount.

merchant.title: 9.3 Cancellations by Merchant
merchant.content: Merchants may cancel an order if products are unavailable, the order cannot be fulfilled, or if delivery is not possible. In these cases, you will receive a full refund.

progress.title: 9.4 Delivery in Progress
progress.content: If your order is already on its way for delivery, it cannot be cancelled.

repeated.title: 9.5 Repeated Cancellations
repeated.content: Customers who repeatedly cancel orders after acceptance may have their account restricted or suspended.

general.title: 10.1 General Policy
general.content: As UrbanDrop connects customers directly with independent merchants, refunds and returns depend on the nature of the item ordered and the circumstances of the request.

perishable.title: 10.2 Perishable and Prepared Items
perishable.content: For perishable goods such as fresh produce, chilled or frozen foods, and cooked meals, refunds or returns are generally not available once an order has been delivered or collected, unless:
items: The item is damaged, expired, or unsafe for consumption at the time of delivery.
The wrong item was delivered.
The order was incomplete.
perishable.note: You must report these issues to UrbanDrop Support within 24 hours of delivery. Supporting evidence such as photos may be required.

nonPerishable.title: 10.3 Non-Perishable Items
nonPerishable.content: For packaged, sealed, or non-perishable items, merchants may accept returns in accordance with UK consumer law if:
items: The item is faulty or not as described.
It is returned unused and in its original packaging.

process.title: 10.4 Refund Process
process.content: Refunds are processed once the merchant confirms eligibility. UrbanDrop will credit the amount back to your original payment method within 5–10 business days of approval.

merchantResp.title: 10.5 Merchant Responsibility
merchantResp.content: Each merchant is responsible for handling refund requests related to their products. UrbanDrop facilitates communication and payment adjustments but is not the final decision-maker.

delivery.title: 10.6 Delivery Issues
delivery.content: If your order is delayed, lost, or delivered to the wrong address, please contact UrbanDrop Support immediately. Refunds or redelivery will be considered based on delivery tracking and merchant confirmation.

abuse.title: 10.7 Refund Abuse
abuse.content: Repeated refund claims without valid cause may result in your account being flagged or suspended.

ip.title: 11. Intellectual Property
ip.content: All trademarks, content, and technology on the Platform are owned by UrbanDrop Group Limited or its licensors. You may not copy, distribute, or modify any part of the Platform without written permission.

availability.title: 12. Platform Availability
availability.content: We aim to keep UrbanDrop available 24/7, but we may suspend or update services for maintenance. We are not liable for any temporary interruptions or data loss resulting from such events.

privacy.title: 13. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Your personal data is collected and processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy, available on the Platform. By using UrbanDrop, you consent to the use of your data for order processing, fraud prevention, and customer service.

role.title: 14.1 Role of UrbanDrop
role.content: UrbanDrop acts as an intermediary between customers and merchants. We are not responsible for:
items: Product quality, safety, or authenticity.
Incorrect or incomplete orders fulfilled by merchants.
Delivery issues caused by third parties.

indirect.title: 14.2 Indirect Losses
indirect.content: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of the Platform.

maximum.title: 14.3 Maximum Liability
maximum.content: Our total liability to any user shall not exceed the amount paid for the relevant order or £50, whichever is lower.

termination.title: 15. Account Termination
termination.content: UrbanDrop may suspend or close your account at any time if you:
items: Violate these Terms.
Engage in fraudulent or abusive activities.
Misuse promotions or violate applicable laws.
termination.note: You may request account deletion at any time by contacting UrbanDrop Support.

links.title: 16. Third-Party Links
links.content: The Platform may contain links to third-party websites. UrbanDrop is not responsible for the content or policies of those sites, and accessing them is at your own risk.

changes.title: 17. Changes to these Terms
changes.content: UrbanDrop may update these Terms periodically. Changes will be effective upon posting on the Platform. Continued use of UrbanDrop constitutes acceptance of the latest version.

governing.title: 18. Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of England and Wales. Any disputes arising from or related to these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.

contact.title: 19. Contact
contact.content: For questions, complaints, or refund requests, please contact:
